mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB WHERE prof_Id=#{profId} AND SUBSTR(prof_Id,1,1)='P'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB WHERE SUBSTR(PROF_ID,1,1) = 'P'
AND SUBSTR(DEPT_CODE,1,1) = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB WHERE SUBSTR(PROF_ID,1,1) = 'P'
AND DEPT_CODE = #{value}
SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(PROF_ID,9,2)) FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB JOIN HD_DEPARTMENT_TB USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE SUBSTR(PROF_ID,1,1) = 'P' AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}

SELECT * FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB JOIN HD_DEPARTMENT_TB USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE SUBSTR(PROF_ID,1,1) = 'P'
AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
AND PROF_ID LIKE '%${search}%' OR PROF_NAME LIKE '%${search}%'
ORDER BY PROF_ENROLL DESC, DEPT_CODE
